## ArrayPath type

Type which eagerly collects all paths through a type which point to an array type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ArrayPath<T> = T extends any ? ArrayPathInternal<T> : never;
```

## Example


```
Path<{foo: {bar: string[], baz: number[]}}> = 'foo.bar' | 'foo.baz'
```
